item.description:
The Blessing for this meal will be:

"LORD WE AINT NEVER GONNA GO HUNGRY AGAIN"


I am getting the FRESH TENDER SUCCULANT MEAT ready right now.

Some of you already know what im getting and its the good stuff....

Some of you being the desert, someone the salad, and someone the potatoes..
If we need an oven i use the Creamatory one right next door

Someone go to the mortuary's package and coffin store and get the RED and PINK wine.

Someone get the sweet desert things... I like Brownies well Blondies too,...and..i wont just kiss the neck and tell what else...

Getting to Barnabas's Mouselum:

321 Silas Deane Highway in Wethersfield..(the map link above is accurate enough) be careful of using Mapquest directions...read what i wrote first and compare...
its a business section but i have one of the last 12 or so residential houses on the street..(the 5th or 6th one down on the right or west side) ...
From hartford area take 84 east to 91 south...take exit #28 (same exit number for either 91 north or 91 south)..its the rte 5/15 exit to Wethersfield..from there take the next exit #85 on to (rte 99 south= Silas Deane Hwy) , take right off exit..you cant turn left anyway here..go strait (south)on Silas Deane hwy ..Landmarks=pass Murcury Oil Gas Satation on right, Price Right store on left and ...further a police station and Drunkin donuts...2 streets on right cumberland st then oxford st....now..on the left is a bunch of businesses..the medium bright medium-blue house is a hair dresser shop..im directly across from it in a small off white little ranch...
On the mail box on the side of the house the #321 is in orange/red...

I will JAM 2 traffic cones on the end of the driveway on the posts

...and have a glowing GOHST of the future in the front yard...

they will take the BITE out of the effort of finding your way to the Mouselum Back Entrance......

Pull way into the back yard... by the grave stones

Im parked at the creamtion house next door...

if my yard is full, then park there but leave the left side garage door accessable for the hearse driver..

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: HOT Spicy Prime Choice Meat and PotaTOES Night at Barnabas's Mouselum
